name: Rather than a person
description: “For it was authority that turned men suspicious and stern-faced. Authority and responsibility which made them not themselves, but a sort of corporate body that tried to think as a corporate body rather than a person.” ― Clifford D. Simak, Time Is the Simplest Thing /// Inspired by this astounding classic sci fi book that shows us how we are not prisoners of time as long as we own our consciousness...
